text: The 200 metres at the 1930 Women's World Games was held in Prague at the Letná Stadiumfrom 6-8 September 1930. 21 athletes from 13 nations competed in the event. ==Entrants== In August 1930, entrants were published of the athletes of 5 nations: the Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland, Italy and Great Britain. Listed below are the athletes from these nations who were entered for the 200 metres event. Nationality Name ==Results== ===Heats=== 6 September ====Heat 1==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Kinue Hitomi Q 2 Anna Dauksza Q 3 Q ? ====Heat 2==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 F. E. Latham Q 2 Sara Teitelbaum Q 3 Luise Girg ? ====Heat 3==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Marie Dollinger Q 2 Orlowka Q 3 Jurgensen ? ====Heat 4==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Stanisława Walasiewicz 25.6 Q 2 Nellie Halstead Q 3 Sumiko Watanabe ? ====Heat 5==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Tollien Schuurman 26.2 / 26.8 Q 2 Detta Lorenz 26.8 Q 3 Anna Hřebřinová 27.6 Q ? Sources: ===Semi-finals=== The semi-finals took place on Sunday 7 September, with bad weather conditions. The top two athletes of each semi-final qualified for the final. ====Semi-final 1==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Stanisława Walasiewicz 26.7 Q 2 Detta Lorenz 27.4 Q 3 Anna Hetbrinova 28.5 ====Semi-final 2==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Nellie Halstead 26.5 Q 2 Marie Dollinger 27.4 Q 3 Dolly Wagner 28.8 ====Semi-final 3==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Tollien Schuurman 26.3 Q 2 Kinue Hitomi 27 Q 3 F. E. Latham Sources: ===Final=== 8 September Rank Name Nationality Time Notes Stanisława Walasiewicz 25.7 Tollien Schuurman 25.8 Nellie Halstead 26.0 4 Detta Lorenz 26.6 DNS Marie Dollinger - DNS Kinue Hitomi - Sources: ==Related pages== *Athletics at the Olympics of Grace – 200 metres ==References== Category:Athletics at the 1930 Women's World Games
title: Athletics at the 1930 Women's World Games – 200 metres
